body_html:
Hi @pocandraspoc
Why "y VERBS support" ?
It means you have chosen to compile with RDMA Verbs support, but you don't have the SW stack (libibverbs, etc..), and I guess you didn't meant to use it.
Run configure and choose "No" for Verbs support.

body:
Hi @pocandraspoc 
Why "y VERBS support" ? 
It means you have chosen to compile with RDMA Verbs support, but you don't have the SW stack (libibverbs, etc..), and I guess you didn't meant to use it.
Run configure and choose "No" for Verbs support.
